name: Unlimited Micro
overview:
Unlimited Micro is a global electronic component distributor located in the United States. With an inventory of over 3.5 million items Unlimited Micro is sure to have the parts needed for the job. Unlimited Micro offers its customers the ability to procure obsolete and allocated parts. Unlimited Micro stocks IC’s, Micro Controllers, FPGA’s, Connectors, Passives and much more. With over 560 manufacturers carried Unlimited Micro can provide its customers with a one stop shop for all their electronic components needs.

Unlimited Micro supplies OEM’s, CM’s and government agencies around the globe. With all facilities located in the United States, Unlimited Micro guarantees product quality for its customers. In an industry flooded with counterfeit components Unlimited Micro provides a safe and easy way to procure those hard to find parts.

To request pricing on a certain part fill out a RFQ at http://unlimitedmicro.com/RequestForQuote.aspx
